description: We're back with a very nice surprise for you this week in the War Chest Update. As many of you know our very own Kaden has been recruiting and shooting some of his own Texas boys for a new series we're doing called Kaden's Recruits. I've been excited about rolling some of this stuff out to you and tonight we're doing just that with a hot Texas boy that Kaden found at the gym. Jaden (yes I'm sure Kaden named him) is a rosy-cheeked, dark-haired stud that is about to join the Army and serve his country. Kaden beat the Army to the draw though and recruited this hottie for another type of Active Duty. Before he ships off to basic training, Kaden's gonna put this cutie through the ropes in a whole new way.As soon as I saw pictures of this cutie I knew I was going to like him. Jaden is fucking adorable and just the type that I think Kaden is good at finding. He's got that slow Texas drawl and some of the sexiest fucking lips. Pair that up with his rosy-red cheeks and awesome body and you've got quite the package. Once Kaden gets this hottie naked, you'll be standing at attention right along with him. Let's take a gander at Jaden in the War Chest Update tonight and be sure to join us here Sunday to see the next step in Jaden's Active Duty training when Kaden turns up the heat with this raw recruit.
title: Jaden
